com.team1389.system.drive

Class PathFollowingSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team1389.system.drive.PathFollowingSystem

  • public class PathFollowingSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    drive system that follows paths autonomously using the Adaptive Pure Pursuit Controller
    Author:
    amind
    See Also:
    AdaptivePurePursuitController

                           double trackWidth,
                           double trackLength,
                           double scrub)
        Parameters:
        drive - a speed controlled drive stream
        state - a state stream for the robot

        maxAccel - in inches/sec^2

    • Method Detail

      • followPath

        public void followPath(Path path,
                       boolean reversed)
        The robot follows a set path, which is defined by Waypoint objects.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to follow
        reversed - whether to follow the path in reverse
        See Also:
        Path

      • getPathMarkersCrossed

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getPathMarkersCrossed()
        Returns:
        a list of identifiers for the waypoints that have been crossed so far

      • isFinishedPath

        public boolean isFinishedPath()
        Returns:
        Returns if the robot mode is Path Following Control and the set path is complete.

      • update

        public void update()
        updates the pathFollower, setting the speeds of the wheels based on the robot's current pose
